thread.title: The Oscars Did a Special Edition of Mean Tweets and the Miles Teller Burn Was Perfect
thread.title_full: The Oscars Did a Special Edition of Mean Tweets and the Miles Teller Burn Was Perfect

author: David Canfield
title: The Oscars Did a Special Edition of Mean Tweets and the Miles Teller Burn Was Perfect

organizations.name: miles teller burn was perfect slate

text:
Slate's Culture Blog Feb. 27 2017 12:02 AM The Oscars Did a Special Edition of Mean Tweets and the Miles Teller Burn Was Perfect By David Canfield 
Jimmy Kimmel wasn’t about to host the Oscars without including a special awards-themed edition of his famed Mean Tweets, with A-listers bemusedly reading insults targeted squarely at them, before an audience of millions. Below, a sampling: 
“Oh, look at me … I’m Ryan Gosling. I have perfect bone structure and fine eyes. Go **** yourself Ryan Gosling.” Advertisement 
“Are we all just ignoring the fact that Felicity Jones and Eddie Redmayne have the same face?” 
“Lin-Manuel Miranda looks like he’s getting a 1996 NBC sitcom with his haircut.” (Miranda, good sport that he is, did not appear to disagree with this.) 
“Emma Stone looks like she plays a crack whore in every role she plays.” 
“Miles Teller has the face of a guy who would request Gangnam Style at a wedding where he doesn’t know either the bride or groom.” Kudos to @Josh for really nailing Miles Teller. 
David Canfield is a Brow Beat intern. Load Comments
